MAN.TITLE: CLKOUT_f
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Scicos Super Block event output port

DESCRIPTION.P: This block must only be used inside Scicos Super Blocks to represent an event output port.
In a Super_Block, the event output ports must be numbered from 1 to the number of event output ports.

ITEMIZE.label: DIALOGUE PARAMETERS
ITEMIZE.ITEM: : an integer giving the port number.
